MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  CH8 postcode area of Holywell, affecting properties in Rayon Road, Bagillt Road, Bala Avenue and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a second fault located whilst carrying out repairs to grounded overhead lines and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:07PM on 10th February 2021.
